mapper.select: SELECT p.*, pd.name, pd.description, pd.tag, pd.meta_title, pd.meta_description, pd.meta_keyword, (SELECT ps.price FROM dr_product_special ps WHERE ps.product_id = p.product_id AND ps.customer_group_id IN('0',#{customer_group_id}) AND ((ps.date_start = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_start < NOW()) AND (ps.date_end = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_end > NOW())) ORDER BY ps.priority ASC, ps.price ASC LIMIT 1) AS special FROM dr_product p LEFT JOIN dr_product_description pd ON (p.product_id = pd.product_id) WHERE p.product_id = #{product_id} AND pd.language_id=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dr_product_recently_view(product_id, customer_id, date_added) VALUES ( #{product_id}, #{customer_id}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.image, pd.name FROM dr_product p, dr_product_description pd, dr_product_recently_view pr WHERE p.product_id = pd.product_id AND pd.product_id = pr.product_id AND pr.customer_id = #{customer_id} AND pr.product_id != #{product_id} AND pd.language_id = 1 ORDER BY pr.date_added DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT p.product_id, p.image, pd.name FROM dr_product p, dr_product_description pd WHERE p.product_id = pd.product_id AND pd.product_id IN (#{products}) AND pd.language_id = 1 LIMIT 0, 5
